TrainSimulator

Class TrainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrainSimulator.TrainController

  • public class TrainController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main Class for the train Controller it will do all the calculation, specification and communication with the TrainControllerGUI and the TrainModel

    • Method Detail

      • executeGUI

        public void executeGUI()
        This function is created so that when the clock is ticking, the commands in this function can be called in order.

      • executeBeacon

        public void executeBeacon()
        The following function receives beacon signals from the train model, and based on the content of the signal, train controller will decide whether to stop the train or not.

      • putBrake

        public void putBrake(int brakeSignal)
        the following function put the brake signal from the train controller into the train model.
        Parameters:
        brakeSignal - an int given by the train controller to assign the brake in the train model

        public void putEmergencyBrake(int emergencyBrakeSignal)

        public void putSafeSpeedLimit(double inputSpeedLimit)

        inputSpeedLimit - an double given by the train controller to assign the safe speed limit in the train model

      • putSafeAuthority

        public void putSafeAuthority(double inputAuthority)
        The following function assigns the train models authority.
        Parameters:
        inputAuthority - an double given by the train controller or track to assign the safe authority in the train model

      • computerPower

        public double computerPower(double suggestedSpeed,
                            double currentSpeed,
                            double maxPower)
        The following function computes the output power using the stored velocity error and the u.
        Parameters:
        suggestedSpeed - a double value that represents the current desired speed of the train in m/s
        currentSpeed - a double value that represents the current speed of the train in m/s
        maxPower - a double value that represents that maxPower of the train in W
        Returns:
        the power input to the train
